languages.text: {n}Уставившись на вас недоверчивым взглядом, Злоба осторожно произносит:{/n} "Не думай, что я забуду и прощу".
{n}Malice stares at you with suspicion and then says cautiously,{/n} "Do not think that I will forget or forgive."
languages.original_text: {n}Уставившись на вас недоверчивым взглядом, Злоба осторожно произносит:{/n} "Не думай, что я забуду и прощу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Malice stares at you with suspicion, then says cautiously,{/n} "Do not think that I will forget or forgive."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}マリスは疑惑の目であなたを見つめ、慎重に言う。{/n}「俺は絶対に忘れたり許したりなどしない」
languages.original_text: {n}Malice stares at you with suspicion and then says cautiously,{/n} "Do not think that I will forget or forgive."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスは疑惑の目であなたを見つめ、慎重に言う。{/n}「俺は絶対に忘れたり許したりなどしない」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}恶棍充满狐疑地看着你，随后谨慎地开了口。{/n}“别以为我会忘记这件事情，也别以为我会原谅你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Malice stares at you with suspicion and then says cautiously,{/n} "Do not think that I will forget or forgive."

traits.locale_text: {n}恶棍充满狐疑地看着你，随后谨慎地开了口。{/n}“别以为我会忘记这件事情，也别以为我会原谅你。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Malicia te mira con desconfianza y luego dice con cautela:{/n} «Ni olvido ni perdono».
languages.original_text: {n}Malice stares at you with suspicion and then says cautiously,{/n} "Do not think that I will forget or forgive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malicia te mira con desconfianza y luego dice con cautela:{/n} «Ni olvido ni perdono».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Tücke starrt dich misstrauisch an und sagt dann vorsichtig:{/n} "Glaubt nicht, dass ich vergesse oder vergebe."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice stares at you with suspicion and then says cautiously,{/n} "Do not think that I will forget or forgive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tücke starrt dich misstrauisch an und sagt dann vorsichtig:{/n} "Glaubt nicht, dass ich vergesse oder vergebe."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Malice vous regarde avec suspicion.{/n} « Ne comptez pas sur moi pour oublier... ou pardonner, » {n}dit-il prudemment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Malice stares at you with suspicion and then says cautiously,{/n} "Do not think that I will forget or forgive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malice vous regarde avec suspicion.{/n} « Ne comptez pas sur moi pour oublier... ou pardonner, » {n}dit-il prudemment.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Melanet, sana şüpheyle dik dik baktıktan sonra ihtiyatla konuşuyor.{/n} "Ne unuturum ne de affederim, sakın yanılma."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice stares at you with suspicion and then says cautiously,{/n} "Do not think that I will forget or forgive."
